list.name: Web Development
descriptions: Proficient in JavaScript (Node.js), Express.js, React.js, MongoDB
Experience with Three.js, p5.js, Socket.io, Tailwind.css, Python Flask, and MySQL

list.name: Artificial Intelligence
descriptions: Well-versed in various AI techniques, including computer vision and natural language processing
Experience in text classification, word embeddings, sequence tagging, neural sequence modeling, Transformer, GPT, BERT, and other advanced NLP techniques

list.name: Other Skills
descriptions: Proficient in Python (including PyTorch, TensorFlow, matplotlib, pandas, etc.), C, Arduino (Java, and various Arduino modules), Git
